page.title: 16OUR OWN STUDIO
page.content: {OUR OWN STUDIO _}This enterprise was started in{1980}by a local art teacher and his wife. The aim was to introduce the local community to the various forms of artistic experience and activities. Twelve interested volunteers organise{exhibitions, {theatre visits}and{"workshops".}The bilingual "workshops" actively involve local children in plays or dramatic experiences. An old chapel vestry was the first site for the studio, but it is now housed in a recently purchased and repaired building. {Money}for the project comes from {District and County Council funds, {grants}from various Art Associations and {fund raising activities}organised by the studio. Membership is free. The Studio holds the{Llandysul Festival-}a weekend of different cultural events.
